\Genetsis\core

\Genetsis\coreOAuth

This class wraps all methods for interactions with OAuth service, for user authentication and validation. Also generates the URLs to perform this operations as register or login.

DEFAULT_EXPIRES_IN

DEFAULT_EXPIRES_IN = 900

Default expiration time. In seconds.

Tags

None found

SAFETY_RANGE_EXPIRES_IN

SAFETY_RANGE_EXPIRES_IN = 0.1

Indicates the percentage to be subtracted from the number of seconds of "expires_in" to not be so close to the expiration date of the token.

Tags

None found

SSO_COOKIE_NAME = 'datr'

Cookie name for SSO (Single Sign-Out).

doGetClientToken(string  $endpoint_url) : mixed

Gets a "client_token" for the current web client.

The endpoint where "client_token" is requested.

Throws

\Exception

If there is an error.

Returns

mixed —

An instance of {@link ClientToken} with data retrieved or FALSE.

The endpoint where "access_token" is requested.

getStoredToken()

getStoredToken(string  $name) : boolean|\Genetsis\core\AccessToken|\Genetsis\core\ClientToken|\Genetsis\core\RefreshToken|mixed|string

Returns a specific stored token.

SESSION has more priority than COOKIE.

Parameters

string $name

The token we want to recover. Are defined in {@link iTokenTypes}

Throws

\Exception

Returns

boolean|\Genetsis\core\AccessToken|\Genetsis\core\ClientToken|\Genetsis\core\RefreshToken|mixed|string —

An instance of {@link StoredToken} or FALSE if we can't recover it.

doCheckUserCompleted()

doCheckUserCompleted(string  $endpoint_url, string  $scope) : boolean

Checks if the user has completed all required data for the specified section (scope).

Parameters

string $endpoint_url

The endpoint where the request will be sent.
string $scope

Section-key identifier of the web client. The section-key is located in "oauthconf.xml" file.

Throws

\Exception

If there is an error.

Returns

boolean —

TRUE if the user has completed all required data or FALSE if not.

static
Inherited from
\Genetsis\core\OAuth

Tags

None found

doCheckUserNeedAcceptTerms()

doCheckUserNeedAcceptTerms(string  $endpoint_url, string  $scope) : boolean

Checks if the user has accepted terms and conditions for the specified section (scope).

Parameters

string $endpoint_url

The endpoint where the request will be sent.
string $scope

Section-key identifier of the web client. The section-key is located in "oauthconf.xml" file.

Throws

\Exception

If there is an error.

Returns

boolean —

TRUE if the user need to accept the terms and conditions (not accepted yet) or FALSE if it has already accepted them (no action required).

static
Inherited from
\Genetsis\core\OAuth

None found
